item.title: Joan add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Reality is merely an illusion, albeit a very persistent one." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Joan add a quote by Apple Computer Inc.
item.description: "Here's to the crazy ones. The misfits. The rebels. The troublemakers. The round pegs in the square holes. The ones who see things differently. They're not fond of rules. And they have no respect for the status quo. You can quote them, disagree with them, glorify or vilify them. About the only thing you can't do is ignore them. Because they change things. They push the human race forward. And while some may see them as the crazy ones, we see genius. Because the people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do." -- Apple Computer Inc.

item.title: Joan add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Joan add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Joan add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Joan add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "Women and cats will do as they please, and men and dogs should relax and get used to the idea." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Joan add a quote by Oprah Winfrey
item.description: "The biggest adventure you can ever take is to live the life of your dreams." -- Oprah Winfrey

item.title: Joan add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Courage is what it takes to stand up and speak; courage is also what it takes to sit down and listen." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Joan add a quote by Bob Dylan
item.description: "You don't need a weatherman to know which way the wind blows." -- Bob Dylan

item.title: Joan add a quote by Bob Dylan
item.description: "I'll let you be in my dreams if I can be in yours" -- Bob Dylan

item.title: Joan add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "A mind is like a parachute. It doesn't work if it is not open." -- Frank Zappa
